channel.title: Comments on: WordPress Plugin Update: LibXML2 Fix

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/12/29/wordpress-plugin-update-libxml2-fix/#comment-3137">Craig</a>.
Odd, I wonder what's going on there.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Craig.

Odd, I wonder what’s going on there.

item.title: By: Craig
item.dc:creator: Craig
item.description:
Hi Joseph
Thanks for the fix. FYI according to bluehost.com, I am running running php 5.2.11 and libxml 2.7.3, so I changed the plugin to add those versions, and still no joy.
So now, a brute force approach was used - remove the "if" statement :-)
Workinh now.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Joseph

Thanks for the fix. FYI according to bluehost.com, I am running running php 5.2.11 and libxml 2.7.3, so I changed the plugin to add those versions, and still no joy.

So now, a brute force approach was used – remove the “if” statement ðŸ™‚

Workinh now.
